trans-unit.source: Represents the configuration element that provides additional configuration settings to connection-oriented transport binding elements, such as TCP and named pipes.
trans-unit.target: 表示為連線導向傳輸繫結項目，例如 TCP 和具名的管道提供額外的組態設定的組態項目。

trans-unit.source: Applies the content of a specified binding element to this binding configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 指定的繫結項目的內容套用至這個繫結組態項目。

trans-unit.source: A binding element.
trans-unit.target: 繫結項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum time the channel can be in the initialization status before being disconnected.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定通道在中斷連接之前，可以處於初始化狀態中的最大時間。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.TimeSpan> structure that specifies the maximum time the channel can be in the initialization status before being disconnected.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.TimeSpan>結構，指定的最大時間通道正在中斷連接之前，可以處於初始化狀態中。</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size of the buffer used to transmit a part of the serialized message on the wire from the client or service.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用來傳輸用戶端或服務的網路上已序列化之訊息部分的緩衝區大小。

trans-unit.source: This value can be changed to provide better throughput based on average message sizes and exchange patterns.
trans-unit.target: 可以變更此值，以提供更佳的輸送量根據平均訊息大小和交換模式。

trans-unit.source: The size of the buffer used to transmit a part of the serialized message on the wire from the client or service.
trans-unit.target: 用來傳輸用戶端或服務的網路上已序列化之訊息部分的緩衝區大小。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 8K.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 8 K。

trans-unit.source: Copies the content of the specified configuration element to this configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的組態項目的內容複製到這個組態項目。

trans-unit.source: The configuration element to be copied.
trans-unit.target: 要複製的組態元素。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the hostname is used to reach the service when matching on the URI.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值會指出主機名稱是否會用來比對 URI 時取用服務。

trans-unit.source: A valid <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WSDualHttpBindingElement.HostNameComparisonMode*> value that indicates whether the hostname is included when routing incoming requests to an endpoint URI.
trans-unit.target: 有效<xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WSDualHttpBindingElement.HostNameComparisonMode*>值，指出當傳送傳入要求至端點 URI 時主機名稱是否包含。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WSDualHttpBindingElement.HostNameComparisonMode*>

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.ServiceModel.HostNameComparisonMode"></xref> , which ignores the hostname in the match.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.ServiceModel.HostNameComparisonMode"> </xref> ，其中忽略主機名稱比對。

trans-unit.source: Initializes this binding configuration element with the content of the specified binding element.
trans-unit.target: 初始化這個繫結組態項目，與指定的繫結項目的內容。

trans-unit.source: A binding element.
trans-unit.target: 繫結項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum size of the buffer to use.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要使用之緩衝區的大小上限。

trans-unit.source: This property only applies to the headers of streamed messages.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性只適用於資料流訊息的標頭。

trans-unit.source: This value should be at least the maximum possible size of the SOAP headers, which are read in buffered mode.
trans-unit.target: 此值至少應該是經過緩衝處理模式中讀取的 SOAP 標頭的最大可能大小。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property must be less than or equal to MaxMessageSize and must be larger than the size of the headers of the message.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值必須小於或等於 MaxMessageSize，而且必須大於訊息標頭的大小。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the channel throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 否則，通道會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If you receive more data than you can buffer, the channel throws a <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationException>, which contains <xref:System.ServiceModel.QuotaExceededException> as an inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果您收到超過可以緩衝的資料，通道會擲回<xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationException>，其中包含<xref:System.ServiceModel.QuotaExceededException>當做內部例外狀況。</xref:System.ServiceModel.QuotaExceededException> </xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationException>

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of bytes that are used to buffer incoming messages in memory.
trans-unit.target: 用來在記憶體中緩衝傳入訊息的位元組數目上限。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 65,536 bytes.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 65,536 位元組。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum interval of time that a part of a message or a full message can remain buffered in memory before being sent out.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定最大的部分訊息或完整訊息在送出之前可以保持在記憶體中緩衝處理的時間間隔。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.TimeSpan> that specifies the maximum interval of time that a part of a message or a full message can remain buffered in memory before being sent out.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.TimeSpan>，指定最大的部分訊息或完整訊息在送出之前可以保持在記憶體中緩衝處理的時間間隔。</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: The default value is 200 milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 200 毫秒。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum number of pending asynchronous accept threads that are available for processing incoming connections on the service.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定最大數目的暫止非同步接受執行緒可用於處理服務上傳入連線。

trans-unit.source: If you anticipate high levels of simultaneous connections, you should adjust this property to handle higher levels of concurrent client connections.
trans-unit.target: 如果您預期高程度的同時連線，您應該調整這個屬性以處理更高層級的用戶端同時連線。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of pending messages the service can accept.
trans-unit.target: 暫止訊息服務可接受最大數目。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 1.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 1。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum number of pending connections.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定擱置連線數目上限。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 100.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 100。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of pending connections.
trans-unit.target: 的擱置連線數目上限。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyCollection"></xref> instance that contains a collection of <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty"></xref> objects that can be attributes or <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> objects of this configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyCollection"></xref>包含集合的執行個體<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty"></xref>可能是屬性的物件或<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref>這個組態項目的物件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyCollection"></xref> instance that contains a collection of <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty"></xref> objects that can be attributes or <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> objects of this configuration element.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyCollection"> </xref>包含集合的執行個體<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty"></xref>可能是屬性的物件或<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref>這個組態項目的物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the messages are buffered or streamed with the connection-oriented transport.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值會指定訊息是經過緩衝處理或使用連線導向傳輸資料流處理。

trans-unit.source: A valid <xref:System.ServiceModel.TransferMode> value that specifies whether a channel uses streamed or buffered modes of message transfer.
trans-unit.target: 有效<xref:System.ServiceModel.TransferMode>值，指定通道是否使用資料流或緩衝訊息傳輸的模式。</xref:System.ServiceModel.TransferMode>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.ServiceModel.TransferMode>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為<xref:System.ServiceModel.TransferMode>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.TransferMode>
